name: Kaptain Krust's Kool Katching Game
description:
My entry for the 2023 Crust Jam, made in about half a day. It's a fishing/typing game, I guess? It's mostly just crust to be honest. Enjoy!

Credits

Design, Programming, """"Art"""", Crust by Mana Kouwenberg
Music by Kevin McLeod
Images by Pexels
Sounds from Freesound
